Reviews.Title: “Great value for money, clean and convenient, but cheap for a reason.”

Reviews.Content: write else opinion based value money paid 30 euros night double shared bathroom stayed february 2012 price decent hotel matches price luxury look price wasnt hotel reception polite ready help location pretty convenient close bustram stations neighbourhood somewhat sketchy vibe nighttime stay hotel clean bathrooms clean shared bathroom cleaned regular basis breakfast okay price pretty lots people home bread jam cold cuts boiled eggs cereals fruit etc vending machines receptions offer fast food comes handy hungry middle night downsides biggest quality sleep im talking beds comfortable albeit tiny walls thin hear people talking fairly quietly ones yell middle night taking tourists account prepared wake middle night miniature size toilet toilets size cupboard werent issue tiny shower uncomfortable times tiny mean tiny stand shower close door stairs luggage bulky andor heavy theyre steep narrow overall hotel crammed tiny price budget option
